dct_title_s: MAPPE-MONDE ou CARTE GENERALE du GLOBE TERRESTRE Representee en deux Plan-Hemispheres, Reveue et changee en plusieurs endriots Suivant les Relations les plus recentes
dct_description_sm: California unlabeled except as Californie I., and with indented northern coastline. The Great Lakes are shown as one long wide body of water. T. de Iesso ou Ieco to the north.
With title cartouche on a banner above the double hemisphere map. Above the map are dark clouds. Below are depictions of natives, animals, and two Europeans surrounded by spoils of their travels.
With pagination: Tom. I. Pag. 1. (top right).

Issued in: Methode pour etudier la geographie ... avec un discours preliminaire sur l’ étude de cette Science ... Tome I. / [Nicolas Lenglet Dufresnoy]. -- Amsterdam: Aux dépens de la Compagnie. M.DCC.XVIII. (1718).
Par le Sr. Sanson, Geographe Ordin: de La Majeste.
